Posts.Content: When the wig started sliding all around (without a cap underneath), it was time for me to try to go without the wig. I work with college aged students and they and my college aged daughter weren't ready yet, but it had to happen. I think they see the super short hair as a reminder. I still feel very short but I've never worn hair this short. It is very gray--more than I had before. Oh, well, right? You get what you get. It could be a lot worse.
Posts.Title: Time to Uncover?
